artist: Artist: Harriet Bart; Author: Harriet Bart; Printer: Presswork and typography by Philip Gallo , at The Hermetic Press, Minneapolis; Book Binder: Case design, fabrication, and binding by Jill Jevne; Publisher: Mnemonic Press, Minneapolis
creditline: The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Books
description: .a: brass metal book cover, with metal borders; "Pb" with square border etched on front cover, and printed on verso of front cover and first page; loose typed letter inserted in fifth page; text, shapes, and images printed on R side of page spreads; symbol printed on last page and verso of back cover .b: book cover with brass-colored mesh cover, and same brass metal edging on outer sides, with metal studs; hinged spine, and brass clasp; black string on verso, in which book rests .c: printed prospectus, with black square at T, with "Pb" in white text inside square; symbol on B of second page; included in a brown envelope
markings: reference page in black text: COPY NO. 24 OF 30
signed: reference page in pencil: H Bart
title: Plumb Bob
